message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your budget concerns, but I can't go as low as $120.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $135 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
